description: This file defines functions related to transforming files, specifically intended for environments other than browsers. It provides a type definition for a transform file function, an implementation of that function, and additional asynchronous and synchronous transformation functions that throw errors when called, indicating that file transformation is unsupported in browsers.

methods.name: transformFile
methods.description: Function for transforming a file given its filename, with optional options, executing a callback upon completion. It supports two signatures internally: one with options and one without.
Function to transform a file; in this implementation, it immediately invokes the callback with an error indicating that transformation isn't supported in browsers.

methods.name: export function transformFileSync(): never { transformFileSync
methods.description: Synchronous function intended to transform a file but throws an error indicating such transformation isn't supported in browsers.

methods.name: export function transformFileAsync() { transformFileAsync
methods.description: Asynchronous function returning a rejected promise with an error that transforming files isn't supported in browsers.
